data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
Free kick Ufa.
Ufa's Lovro Bizjak gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Krasnodar.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Ufa.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a throw-in for Krasnodar, close to Ufa's area.
Free kick in a good position for Krasnodar!
Stanislav Vasilev awards Ufa a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Krasnodar.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Ufa throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Throw-in for Ufa close to the penalty box.
Ufa to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
Ufa are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ufa are pushing forward but Olivier Thill's finish is wide of the goal.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Ufa are coming forward and Oston Urunov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Ufa are whistled for offside.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Ufa.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vyacheslav Krotov for Ufa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Ufa’s Olivier Thill is on his feet again at Krasnodar Stadium.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Olivier Thill for Ufa who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in for Ufa at Krasnodar Stadium.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Ufa's half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Krasnodar just outside Ufa's area.
Aleksandr Sukhov (Ufa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Ufa have a goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ufa.
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Krasnodar's Ari has run offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Krasnodar.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Ufa's Vyacheslav Krotov gets in a shot on goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Ufa's half.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over at Krasnodar Stadium.
Sergei Petrov (Krasnodar) has received a first yellow card.
Stanislav Vasilev has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in Krasnodar.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Aleksandr Chernikov with Marcus Berg.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
At Krasnodar Stadium, Kaio Pantaleao has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Krasnodar drive forward but Marcus Berg is judged offside.
Can Ufa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Krasnodar's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Krasnodar capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Ufa a goal kick.
Sergey Matveev (Krasnodar) is making a second substitution, with Shapi Suleymanov replacing Daniil Utkin.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Kristoffer Olsson (Krasnodar) gets a yellow card.
Ufa have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Ufa's Oston Urunov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Krasnodar defender.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Goal kick for Ufa at Krasnodar Stadium.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Ufa.
Krasnodar pushes forward through Wanderson, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Ufa.
Daniil Fomin is booked for the away team.
Marcus Berg scores to make it 1-0 at Krasnodar Stadium.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ufa.
Vadim Evseev is making the team's first substitution at Krasnodar Stadium with Gamid Agalarov replacing Vyacheslav Krotov.
Krasnodar will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Ufa.
Wanderson (Krasnodar) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In Krasnodar Ufa attack through Daniil Fomin. The finish is off target, however.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Free kick Krasnodar.
Shapi Suleymanov of Krasnodar smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Krasnodar.
The away team have replaced Lovro Bizjak with Andres Vombergar. This is the second substitution made today by Vadim Evseev.
Krasnodar's Shapi Suleymanov breaks free at Krasnodar Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Ufa a goal kick.
Krasnodar's Wanderson is on target but unsuccessful.
Shapi Suleymanov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Krasnodar.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Krasnodar's Kaio Pantaleao attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Ufa at Krasnodar Stadium.
Denis Terentjev is replacing Olivier Thill for Ufa at Krasnodar Stadium.
Krasnodar have been awarded a penalty...
Bojan Jokic (Ufa) has received a first yellow card.
Ufa's Aleksandr Belenov has been booked in Krasnodar.
Goal! Ari extends Krasnodar's lead from the spot. They now lead 2-0.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andres Vombergar (Ufa) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in Ufa.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Krasnodar drive upfield and [62] gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a [60] defender.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Nikita Sergeev is on a sub for Wanderson for Krasnodar.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Krasnodar needs to be cautious. Ufa have an attacking throw-in.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Ufa are caught offside.
Cristian Ramirez (Krasnodar) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ufa's Andres Vombergar is back in action after a slight knock.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
Attention is being given to Ufa’s Andres Vombergar and play has been suspended briefly.
